frameworks.openingRemark: Node.js is the first and foremost tool to install.
frameworks.theWhy: Node.js handles the installation of open source applications through NPM, the package manager for the Node.js server platform. Node functions as a warehouse of third-party applications, while NPM not only delivers the packages but installs the code and manages the code dependencies. All installations are run through the command line.
